describe.zh_CN: 想知道物品里究竟含有什么元素？这就需要搭建一个结构解析祭坛。\n在下方摆上魔力平台，并放上物品，等待片刻，上面的解析台中就能看到这个物品的元素信息了。
describe.en_US: If you want to know what elements are contained in an item, you'll need to set up a Structure Analysis Altar.\nPlace a Magic Platform underneath and put the item on it. After a moment, you'll be able to see the element's information of the item on the Structure Analyzer table above.
